title: rakshhimpavE srI
sahitya:
rakSimpavE shrI rajata nilaya vrSabhadvAjananda mOkSa vara dAyaka



anupallavi



 kukSilO prapancamunu nirvahincina nIku pakSa pATamu gAdurA praNatArthihara nannu



caraNam



 dakSiNa kailAsamandu dikSitO vasiyunci kAmAkSi kaliki I jagat sAkSiga uNDi nI vikSinci 

shrI tyAgarAjuni gAvincuTa (rakSimpu) upEkSitamu ElarA uraga bhUSaNa nannu
